ComicInfo.Summary:
The Woman Who Died Forever!: Johnny Peril discovers why Lucy Angell has stolen the necklace known as "The Angel's Smile."
Bring Me Back to Life: John Benson, wanted for murder, has the warlock Trunche transform him into another person.
The Skull That Lived!: Professor Curtin finds a strange ancient jawbone.
